item.title: Git For Newbies
item.description: Before we start make sure git --version command successfully returns. If the output is something like command not found then please make sure Git is properly installed on your machine. If you haven’t installed git then download from this Git Link My machine output is shown below. Output on your machine might be different. Commands that a user should type on his/her terminal are prefixed with the shell prompt symbol $.

item.title: Rename a local and remote branch in git
item.description: if you have named a branch incorrectly and pushed to the remote repository or more precisely if you think you have messed up then follow this steps 1.) Rename your local branch If you are on the branch you want to rename: git branch -m new-name if you are on different branch git branch -m old-name new-name 2.) Delete the old-name remote branch and push the new-name local branch git push origin :old-name new-name 3.

item.title: Open Source
item.description: Today Open source software is used by everyone and everywhere knowingly or unknowingly but it was not like this from the beginning Blah blah it all started somewhere and now we are here Smells like open source Android ? prolly you would be using android device right now ? welp that’s a Open source So what is Open source? Open Source is a term denoting that product includes permission to use its source code, design documents,or content.
